title: Uninstalled League of Legends due to the client error
body: So I'm trying to redownload it, but it says Failed network error.  ???

replies.body:
Has a lot to do with the simple fact that thousands of people are redownloading and patching their clients right now.
Namely due to the bug that claims you have an instance already opened.

The repair tool doesn't work either...
A fresh install has to be done, and that's a time killer...especially with some of the ELO's...and their eagerness to prove their elite status.

Sounds like you're not able to connect to our patching servers.  Though it's usually more directed at in-game connections, the steps in our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article should also help for this.  Let me know how it goes!
